Dialog Turns 3.Speaker: Sheldon
Dialog Turns 3.Dialog: Not surprising. Penny's emotional response is originated in the primitive portion of the brain, known as the amygdala. While speech is centered in the much more recently developed neo-cortex. The former can easily overpower the latter, giving scientific credence to the notion of being rendered speechless.
